# Tannery (Building)
## Overview
**Tannery**

**Create** 20 Goods, 1 Influence, 20 Labor (830 gp)

**Rooms** 1 Laundry, 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Leather Workshop (Room)|Leather Workshop]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Pit (Room)|Pit]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A structure where workers prepare hides and leather.
